project: You wake up on the bed. Even though you ate two hours ago, you are still hungry. You decide to hunt for food. Your friend Morra is sleeping next to you.
You jump off the bed and leave Morra sleeping. You smell something yummy, someone might be cooking.
As you get closer to the kitchen you realize bacon is being cooked. Your owner Jared is focused on guarding the pan.
You sit on the recliner and wait a few minutes. You hear Jared walk toward the bedroom. The hunger is getting to you.
You jump on the counter and knock the grilled cheese over the counter. You pick out the bacon and eat it. Yummy!

After a few minutes you hear someone walk to the kitchen. The hunger gets to you and you walk out. You see your owner Jared standing in front of you. He spots you and knows you're trying to steal his grilled cheese. No yummy bacon for you.
Jared caught you! No yummy bacon for you.
You hide in the bathroom and hear someone walking to the bedroom. Although the bathroom smells stinky, the smell is bacon is still strong.
You don't see anyone as you walk into the kitchen. You see a bacon grilled cheese on the counter.
You jump on the counter and knock the grilled cheese over the counter. You pick out the bacon and eat it. Yummy!

After a few minutes you hear someone walk to the kitchen. The hunger gets to you and you walk out of the cabinet. You see your owner Jared standing in front of you. He spots you and knows you're trying to steal his grilled cheese. No yummy bacon for you.

After a couple minutes of waiting, the hunger gets to you. You don't hear anyone so you go to the kitchen. A grilled cheese is on the ground and Morra is standing over it. It looks like she ate all the bacon, no yummy bacon for you.
You wake Morra up. She's not happy about it but is also hungry. You both jump off the bed. You smell something yummy, someone might be cooking.
As you get closer to the kitchen you realize bacon is being cooked. Your owner Jared is focused on guarding the pan.
Jared caught you! No yummy bacon for you.

You sit on the recliner and wait a few minutes. Morra is frantic and goes to the kitchen. Jared spots her and kicks her out of the kitchen. He walks toward her owner Josue's room, probably to warn him of her hunger.

After a few minutes you hear someone walk to the kitchen. The hunger gets to you and you walk out of the cabinet. You see Jared standing in front of you. He spots you and knows you're trying to steal his grilled cheese. No yummy bacon for you.
You jump on the counter and knock the grilled cheese over the counter. You pick out the bacon and eat it. Yummy!
Morra is frantic but still follows you. You hide in the bathroom and hear someone walking to the bedroom. Although the bathroom smells stinky, the smell is bacon is still strong.
You don't see anyone as you and Morra walk into the kitchen. You see a bacon grilled cheese on the counter.
You jump on the counter and knock the grilled cheese over the counter. Morra quickly snatches the bacon and refuses to share. Her gluttony sickens you. No yummy bacon for you.

You hide in the cabinet but Morra doesn't follow you. You hear her knock over the grilled cheese. You walk out of the cabinet as Morra quickly snatches the bacon and refuses to share. Her gluttony sickens you. No yummy bacon for you.

Morra does not wait for you and quickly leaves. After a few minutes you go to the kitchen. A grilled cheese is on the ground and Morra is standing over it. It looks like she ate all the bacon, no yummy bacon for you.
